    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, FragmentChooser.Callback
    直系の既知のサブクラス:

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements FragmentChooser.Callback

        public void onAttachFragment(android.support.v4.app.Fragment fragment)

        public <T> T executeGoogleApi(GoogleApiTask<T> task)
